oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Stuart Duncan and Ron Block - 2017-03-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Musician spotlight program featuring Stuart Duncan with Ron Block from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall and Museum on March 12, 2017. 2nd in the Musician spotlight series of programs. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Stuart Duncan; Ron Block;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (11:51) Opening comments from Abigail St. Pierre and introduction of Stuart Duncan / (15:52) Opening comments from Stuart / (16:35) Medley of Brushy Fork Of John's Creek and The Mason's Apron (Stuart Duncan-fiddle and Ron Block-banjo) / (19:28) History of Stuart and his relationship with Ron and Alison Brown / (24:40) The New Five Cents / (27:16) Ron talks about his early history in Nashville and beginning to work with Alison Kraus / (29:23) Carter's Creek Pike / (32:03) Stuart talks about being a bluegrass music fan and growing up in California / (34:22) Ron talks about playing banjo and growing up in California / (35:09) Stuart talks about touring with Earl Scruggs and Earl telling the story about putting string benders on the banjo peg head and covering them up / (34:04) Sally Goodin' / (41:21) Stuart talks about bow rosin / (40:53) Stuart talks about starting his recording session career and learning how to back up vocalists /

(43:57) Stuart tells Lyle Lovett story and playing backing to him / (44:44) Ron tells story about playing guitar on sessions / (45:12) Ivy (Ron Block-vocal) / (47:50) Ivy (excerpt with Stuart playing obtrusive fiddle as an example) / (49:22) Stuart talks about Orange Blossom Special / (51:42) Orange Blossom Special (Stuart and Ron-vocals) / (55:00) Ron talks about one of his albums and naming if after his Dad's music store / (55:44) Story of the song Mooney Flat Road / (56:43) Mooney Flat Road / (59:04) Question about how decisions are made in what is played during recording session / (01:01:55) Question about the difference between a fiddle and violin / (01:07:54) Answers question about working with big names in the business and tells story about playing at the Kennedy Center and Anne Hathaway crying story / (01:09:45) Stuart tells story about purposely confusing people telling them that Dolly Parton was his favorite fiddler /
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Duncan, Stuart; Block, Ron, 1964-; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
